name: Poisonous
description:
October 1, 2018 (uploaded on the second because i couldn't figure out godot's html exporting last night)

I'm going to try to make 31 games this month, inspired by inktober, but I started pretty late today, so it's not really a whole game, I'll probably come back to some of these next month to fix them up

all you can do for now is get your sheep to follow you around by keeping them in the light for a while

left click to direct friendly sheep

you are a farmer

rescue your sheep

it takes a little while to load
